name: Tuytsi Hiver Fitted Dress
description: A gentle A-line fitted dress that enhances the body's natural curves while cleverly concealing imperfections. Made from premium Tuytsi fabric that is soft, breathable, durable, and beautiful. The A-line design provides a gentle, elegant yet comfortable fit. The V-neckline is graceful, flattering, and adds a touch of sensuality. Comes with a waist belt that creates a focal point and balance for the outfit. Long sleeves, suitable for cool weather or formal styles. Appropriate for many occasions: work, parties, partner meetings, or gatherings.

name: Tapta Fitted Dress with Collared Neck
description: A perfect combination of classic and modern elements, bringing a fashionable yet graceful beauty, suitable for ladies who love elegant and confident style. The premium Tapta fabric combined with high-quality Tuysi features an artistic shiny floral surface, maintaining perfect shape and an attractive appearance. The dress has durability and wrinkle resistance, ideal for wearing on important occasions without worrying about looking unkempt. Classic collared design with subtle metallic trim that adds just enough highlight. The lower body features a stylized diagonal cut, bringing uniqueness while creating a slimming effect and skillfully accentuating the figure. A product with meticulous, precise stitching, with emphasis on pleated details to create a balanced and harmonious overall look.

name: Signature Flared Silk Dress with Bow Collar
description: The silk dress is part of the Her Signature collection featuring sophisticated stylized design details combined with subtle patterns, expressing a statement about new office fashion style - a confident, elegant yet graceful style. - Premium soft silk material with light sheen, breathable - Unique bow collar design, creating an elegant and outstanding accent - Gentle flared silhouette, bringing feminine and fluid beauty - Moderate length, easy to pair with high heels and delicate accessories - Suitable for many occasions such as parties, meeting friends or dating

name: V-neck Scarlet Bloom Dress
description: A dress that perfectly combines classic beauty and modern elegance, helping you stand out at any event. The graceful A-line design, elegant long sleeves, along with a unique V-neck detail creates an attractive focal point.

name: Eclipse Flared Lace Dress
description: With its striking color scheme, the Eclipse dress design is the perfect choice for ladies who love feminine and gentle beauty. This dress model not only
with its modest round neckline but also with the lace accents at the dress hem, giving ladies an elegant appearance with a hint of seduction.

name: Tweed A Timeless Dress
description: The Red Tweed A TIMELESS is a symbol of elegance, luxury, and femininity. Crafted from premium tweed fabric, the dress brings a classic yet modern beauty, helping you stand out in any situation. - Premium tweed material, thick and well-structured, maintains shape well, delivering an elegant and luxurious appearance - Fashionable red color, suitable for various occasions from work to events - Graceful A-line design, unique stylized neckline, elegant long sleeves - Meticulous tailoring, knee-length sophistication, suitable for various body types

name: Đầm lụa Floral Glow
description: Lấy cảm hứng từ sắc hoa mùa xuân rực rỡ, đầm lụa Floral Glow là hiện thân của sự nhẹ nhàng, nữ tính và đầy tinh tế. Được làm từ lụa cao cấp, chiếc đầm mang đến cảm giác mềm mại, thoáng mát. Đầm nhẹ nhàng ôm lấy cơ thể, tôn lên vẻ đẹp tự nhiên của nàng. Thiết kế đầm xòe thanh thoát với điểm nhấn họa tiết hoa tinh xảo, kết hợp gam màu vàng nhã nhặn, giúp tôn lên mọi tông da. Đường cắt may khéo léo ôm sát vừa phải, tạo hiệu ứng thon gọn và thanh lịch. Đặc biệt, chi tiết cổ chữ V duyên dáng, mang lại vẻ ngoài hài hòa giữa vẻ đẹp hiện đại và cổ điển. Đầm phù hợp cho những buổi dạo phố, tiệc trà hoặc sự kiện nhẹ nhàng. Dễ dàng cùng nàng nổi bật, tự tin trong mọi ánh nhìn.

name: Tuysi Twilight Petals Dress
description: A perfect choice for elegant and sophisticated office style, the _Tuysi Twilight Petals_ fitted dress brings modern beauty while maintaining traditional grace. The dress uses premium tuysi fabric with slight stretch, providing comfort throughout the workday while maintaining an elegant appearance. The design features a gentle fitted silhouette, conforming to the body, accentuating feminine lines without compromising professionalism. The stylized neckline brings uniqueness, creating a focal point without being overly elaborate. Notably, the knee-length design enhances formality, suitable for the office environment. The dress is an ideal choice for important meetings, client meetings, or even conferences that require polished appearance while still highlighting personal style.

name: Off-shoulder Fitted Knit Dress
description: Off-shoulder knit dress with decorative tie collar, long sleeves, gathered bust, mid-calf length. The knit fabric has moderate thickness, stretches to hug the body enhancing your figure. Pair with a long coat and high boots for confident winter wear.

name: Velvet flared dress with puffy sleeves
description: Flared dress with round neck and three-quarter sleeves. High waist, fitted at waist, pumpkin-style double-layered skirt. Puffy shoulders, back zipper. Made from soft ribbed jersey fabric with light stretch.

name: Primal Elegance Office Dress
description: The design is part of Léopard De Luxe - a collection specifically for ladies seeking boldness in modern office style. The gentle V-neck fitted dress helps accentuate the body's natural curves while cleverly concealing imperfections. Made from premium Tuytsi fabric that is soft, breathable, durable and beautiful. The A-line design is gently fitted, elegant yet comfortable. The sleek V-neck is flattering and brings a touch of sensuality. Comes with a waist belt that helps create focus and balance for the outfit. Long sleeves, suitable for cool weather or elegant style. Appropriate for many occasions: work, parties, partner meetings or gatherings.

name: Leopard Noir Tuytsi Dress
description: Flared dress, long sleeves, round neck, plain pattern, Tuytsi material. Model wears size S. Height 165 cm, weight 49 kg, measurements: 81-63-90 cm.

name: Leopard De Luxe Jersey Dress
description: The _Léopard De Luxe_ dress is a unique design for girls who love personality and luxury. The highlight of the product is the trendy _leopard_ print pattern, expressing a strong style and bringing an alluring appearance. Made from premium jersey material, with light stretch, breathable and comfortable to wear. The dress comes with a stylish belt, features a gentle fitted design that accentuates body curves. Suitable for street walks, light parties, meeting friends or elegant events.

name: Leopard Silk Flared Dress with Collar
description: The Leopard Silk Flared Dress will surely make you the center of attention with its beauty that is both luxurious, distinctive, and seductive. The leopard print is a striking highlight, affirming a strong and captivating style. The classic collared design combined with a gentle flared silhouette creates balance, accentuates the slim waist, bringing a feminine yet powerful appearance.

name: Black Dahlia Boat Neck Dress
description: A simple yet captivating dress design, perfect for girls who love modern style while maintaining femininity and comfort. Made from premium Cotton jersey material, the dress provides softness, elasticity, and breathability, helping you feel comfortable throughout the day.

name: SOLAR Stylish V-neck Dress
description: SOLAR Stylish V-neck Dress from the Fall-Winter 2024 collection features a V-neck design, short sleeves, and luxurious Tweed material. The layered silhouette gracefully accentuates body curves, perfect for cool days. The burgundy color brings a classic and elegant neo-classical beauty.

name: Hong Yen Long Dress
description: Hong Yen is part of the Yen Hoa Ao Dai Collection, inspired by the serenity and brilliance of spring flowers in full bloom! To honor the gentle and delicate features, the design uses soft organza fabric with coral pink patterns delicately present on the fabric background. Along with that, the graceful straight silhouette and elegant three-quarter sleeves make Hong Yen a perfect choice for all body types, providing comfort while maintaining feminine charm. Notably, there's a special detail designed exclusively for IVY moda's muses - the Yen Chau beads peeking through the dress panels as an interesting accent that remains perfectly harmonious with the overall outfit.

name: V-neck Fitted Dress Fleur de
description: The Fleur de fitted dress is a delicate blend of elegant style and modern features, bringing a seductive and graceful beauty to the wearer. The upper body of the dress is designed with a comfortable fit, creating a light feeling while maintaining elegance. The lower body features a pencil-fit silhouette, helping to accentuate body curves, with added stylized ruffles creating unique, fashionable highlights. Made from premium Silk combined with Tuysi fabric: soft, providing comfort when worn. Stylized V-neck, comfortable upper body, and seductive fitted lower body. Ruffles on the lower body create a unique, modern touch. The dress suits various body types and is easy to mix with accessories.
